name: The Legend of Ganondorf
flavorText: "Known by many names, born as the only male once every century, he embodies pure evil and hatred. Seeking world domination, he is often thwarted by a young hero." This seems to tell a different story than you were expecting.
flavorTextHtml: "Known by many names, born as the only male once every century, he embodies pure evil and hatred. Seeking world domination, he is often thwarted by a young hero." This seems to tell a different story than you were expecting.
description: Provides transmogrification plans for The King of the Gerudo themed armaments.
descriptionHtml: Provides transmogrification plans for The King of the Gerudo themed armaments.
